patthana16.13:1.1_0: Akusalaṁ āsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo naāsavo dhammo …pe…
patthana16.13:1.1_3: nakusalo naāsavo ca naabyākato naāsavo ca dhammā …pe…
patthana16.13:1.1_4: nakusalo naāsavo ca naakusalo naāsavo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana16.13:2.1_0: Akusalaṁ noāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nanoāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.13:2.1_1: Akusalaṁ noāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naabyākato nanoāsavo dhammo …pe…
patthana16.13:2.1_2: nakusalo nanoāsavo ca naabyākato nanoāsavo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana16.13:4.1_0: Akusalaṁ āsavasampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo naāsavasampayutto dhammo …pe…
patthana16.13:4.1_3: nakusalo naāsavasampayutto ca naabyākato naāsavasampayutto ca dhammā …pe…
patthana16.13:4.1_4: nakusalo naāsavasampayutto ca naakusalo naāsavasampayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana16.13:5.1_0: Akusalaṁ āsavavippayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo naāsavavippayutto dhammo …pe…
patthana16.13:5.1_2: nakusalo naāsavavippayutto ca naabyākato naāsavavippayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana16.13:6.1_0: Akusalaṁ āsavañceva sāsavañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo naāsavo ceva naanāsavo ca dhammo …pe…
patthana16.13:6.1_1: nakusalo naāsavo ceva naanāsavo ca dhammo …pe…
patthana16.13:6.1_2: naabyākato naāsavo ceva naanāsavo ca dhammo …pe…
patthana16.13:6.1_3: nakusalo naāsavo ceva naanāsavo ca naabyākato naāsavo ceva naanāsavo ca dhammā …pe…
patthana16.13:6.1_4: nakusalo naāsavo ceva naanāsavo ca naakusalo naāsavo ceva naanāsavo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana16.13:7.1_0: Akusalaṁ sāsavañceva no ca āsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo naanāsavo ceva nano ca āsavo dhammo …pe…
patthana16.13:7.1_1: naabyākato naanāsavo ceva nano ca āsavo dhammo …pe…
patthana16.13:7.1_2: nakusalo naanāsavo ceva nano ca āsavo naabyākato naanāsavo ceva nano āsavo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana16.13:8.1_0: Akusalaṁ āsavañceva āsavasampayuttañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo naāsavo ceva naāsavavippayutto ca dhammo …pe…
patthana16.13:8.1_1: naabyākato naāsavo ceva naāsavavippayutto ca dhammo …pe…
patthana16.13:8.1_2: nakusalo naāsavo ceva naāsavavippayutto ca naabyākato naāsavo ceva naāsavavippayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana16.13:9.1_0: Akusalaṁ āsavasampayuttañceva no ca āsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo naāsavavippayutto ceva nano ca āsavo dhammo …pe…
patthana16.13:9.1_1: naabyākato naāsavavippayutto ceva nano ca āsavo dhammo …pe…
patthana16.13:9.1_2: nakusalo naāsavavippayutto ceva nanoāsavo ca naabyākato naāsavavippayutto ceva nano ca āsavo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
